Top_Description: Headquartered in Australia, Swivel Group and our subsidiaries bring solutions for businesses experiencing growth, geared to support scale, keeping up with compounding customer demands and operating with a higher level of efficiency. We do this through the effective value chain of brands spread across three regions and counting: partnering with our clients throughout the digital lifecycle with the full range of services catering to technology and finance, all under one roof.
OurClients_Description: We have had the opportunity to work in a wide range of domains, technologies, and processes; with stellar clients that have given us a deep understanding of industry standards and engineering best practices.
OurLeadershipTeam_Description: Empowering the community and committed to creating innovative solutions that will transform the future of technology and finance; the Swivel leadership embodies our culture and values of premium, innovation, trust, respect, and teamwork.
WantToWorkWithUs_Description: Join Swivel for an innovative, premium, people-first culture. Elevate your journey with industry experts. Connect with our recruitment team for the next great venture of your career.
